title: Professional development coordinated with parenting constraints
description: Professional development coordinated with parenting constraints
content:
Scenario: Professional development coordinated with parenting constraints
    Given Sarah wants to pursue professional growth
    And she has limited time due to parenting responsibilities
    When Sarah considers professional development opportunities
    Then the workplace_elohim should help her assess feasibility
    And it should integrate family constraints into planning
    And it should help her find development opportunities compatible with parenting
    And professional growth should be possible despite parenting demands
    And the system should support career development for working parents
    And Sarah should not have to choose between career and family
